Sentencas: This paper analyzes the influence of synthesis conditions on the reducibility and catalytic behavior of Ce0.9Zr0.1O2 mixed oxide synthesized by alpha-amino acid/metallic nitrate combustion processes, through stoichiometric and non-stoichiometric routes.
Titulo: Ce0.9Zr0.1O2 nanocatalyst: Influence of synthesis conditions in the reducibility and catalytic activity

Sentencas: We concluded that the alpha-amino acid selected and the a-amino acid/nitrate molar ratio strongly influence the reducibility and catalytic activity in the total combustion of methane.
Titulo: Ce0.9Zr0.1O2 nanocatalyst: Influence of synthesis conditions in the reducibility and catalytic activity

Sentencas: Thus, the Ce0.9Zr0.1O2 catalyst synthesized by the stoichiometric route with glycine showed the higher catalytic activity, which, in conjunction with the well-known ionic and electronic conductivities of ceria-based oxides under reducing conditions, positions this solid as an appropriate anode material for methane-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Ce0.9Zr0.1O2 nanocatalyst: Influence of synthesis conditions in the reducibility and catalytic activity
